Hero Description:
Helping businesses build scalable digital products.
Specializing in SaaS Platforms, Custom ERPs, and High-Performance Mobile Apps.
About Description: I am a Full-Stack Solutions Architect focused on delivering business value through technology. While I specialize in the Laravel ecosystem, I work with a network of experts to provide complete Digital Product solutions. Whether you need a complex SaaS platform, a custom ERP, or a cross-platform mobile app, I help turn your vision into a scalable reality.
Message sent successfully!: Thank you for reaching out, :name! I've received your message and will get back to you as soon as possible.
Web App Description: Designing and building scalable, multi-tenant SaaS platforms and enterprise ERP systems using Laravel & Modern Frontend stacks.
Mobile App Description: High-performance cross-platform mobile applications (iOS & Android) built for scalability and seamless user experience.
Consultation Description: Strategic guidance on system architecture, database design, and MVP planning to help startups scale from zero to one.
Payment Description: Architecting secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways and real-time ledger systems integrated with global providers like Stripe and Paymob.
Real-Time Description: Building event-driven architectures and real-time dashboards using WebSockets and Redis for high-frequency data applications.
Integrations Description: Designing robust REST/GraphQL APIs and orchestrating complex third-party ecosystem integrations (ERP, CRM, Marketing).
Skills Description: Proficient in PHP (Laravel), Filament v3, Livewire, and related technologies. Experienced with MySQL, Redis, Docker, and Linux environments. Knowledgeable in Frontend technologies like Blade, Alpine.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. Strong adherence to OOP, MVC, SOLID Principles, and Clean Code practices.
Gap Cloud Description: Leading the architecture of a multi-tenant SaaS ERP serving 50+ enterprise clients. Focusing on high-availability, Redis caching strategies for performance, and scalable database design for heavy transaction loads.
Seena-Pay Description: Architected secure payment gateways compliant with financial regulations. Integrated multi-vendor payment providers (Paymob, Stripe) and built a real-time ledger system for transaction tracking.
Freelance Description: Partnering with global clients to deliver end-to-end digital solutions. From requirement gathering to deployment, I build custom SaaS platforms and mobile backends that drive business growth.
AAST Name: Arab Academy for Science, Technology & Maritime Transport (AAST)
AAST Description: Expanding expertise through advanced computer science studies.
Cairo Univ Description: Graduated with a focus on humanities.
Contact Text: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, freelance projects, or just to say hi! I'm always open to discussing new ideas and opportunities.
